name: VIRGINIA TOURISM CORPORATION
description: Business entity of the Virginia Tourism Authority.
sampleDescriptions: Advocacy for legislative or regulatory relief to offset the economic impacts of the coronavirus on Virginia tourism.
Monitoring and advocacy for legislative and regulatory actions related to coronavirus economic relief efforts.

Monitoring and advocacy for legislative and regulatory actions related to coronavirus economic relief efforts and Economic Development Administration (EDA) grants.
